flawed_nl_solution:
After this summer, she will have twice as many posters as when she had 14, so she will have C + 6 = 2 * 14 = 82 posters.
Thus, Cassidy has C = 82 - 6 = <<82-6=76>>76 posters now.
#### 76

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 82. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
